question: Which veteran Indian Army officer has been appointed to lead United Nations' Mission in war-hit Yemen?
explanation: Lieutenant General (retired) Abhijit Guha has been appointed by UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres as the Chair of the Redeployment Coordination Committee (RCC) and head of the United Nations Mission to support the Hodeidah Agreement (UNMHA). He has been tasked with leading the UN oversight of a ceasefire agreement between Yemen\'s government and the Iran-backed Houthi rebels in the strife-torn Yemenâ€™ port city of Hodeidah. He will succeed Lieutenant General Michael Lollesgaard.
